cards.title: Layer 1
cards.description: Flokicoin operates as a Layer 1 blockchain...

roadmap.subtitle: Community
roadmap.intro: Each milestone reflects the strength of collaboration, shaped through our communication channels and refined via FEPs (Fun Enhancement Possibilities) and FIPs (Flokicoin Improvement Proposals).

milestones.title: Taproot Activation
milestones.label: [ Low fees, high Privacy ]
milestones.description: Taproot activated, improving transaction efficiency, scalability, and privacy.

milestones.title: Scrypt Family
milestones.label: [ Strong Network Security ]
milestones.description: Flokicoin will join the Scrypt family at block 115,840.

milestones.title: Lightning Network
milestones.label: [ fast, low-cost ]
milestones.description: Enabling instant payments and microtransactions across the ecosystem.

milestones.title: Off-Chain Computation
milestones.label: [ OP_CAT, ZKP ]
milestones.description: Enabling on-chain verification of zero-knowledge proofs.

cards.title: tWallet
cards.description: Store, send, and receive your digital assets with our simple, secure, and user-friendly wallet, designed for simplicity and peace of mind.

cards.title: Explorer
cards.description: Track blocks and transactions, check wallet balances, stay updated on mining metrics and network activity in real-time, and more.

questions.question: What is Flokicoin?
questions.answer: Flokicoin is a Layer 1 blockchain that was initially launched in 2021 following Elon Musk's tweet ("Floki has arrived").

questions.question: Who founded Flokicoin?
questions.answer: Flokicoin was originally launched by an anonymous developer, who abandoned the project shortly after its initial release at block 19,721.

questions.question: When did Flokicoin's revival take place?
questions.answer: Flokicoin was revived in 2024 at block 19,721. Instead of starting from zero, we continued from the original 2021 chain, maintaining the history integrity.

questions.question: What are Flokicoin's key features?
questions.answer:
• 1-minute block time
• Auxiliary mining support
• Halving every 210,000 blocks
• Initial block reward is 1000 $FLC per block, halving until it stabilizes at 21 $FLC
• No transaction tax
• DAO governance

questions.question: Is Flokicoin environmentally friendly since it uses Proof of Work (PoW) mining?
questions.answer: While PoW mining requires energy, Flokicoin optimizes energy use by leveraging auxiliary mining. This allows participants to mine Flokicoin alongside other chains, optimizing resource usage.

questions.question: What is $LOKI?
questions.answer:
$LOKI is the smallest unit of a Flokicoin ($FLC)

1 $FLC = 100,000,000 $LOKI

questions.question: How can I join the Flokicoin community?
questions.answer: You can join the Flokicoin community through our social media channels and chat groups. Get involved in governance decisions, participate in development discussions, and help define the fun through FEPs (Fun Enhancement Possibilities).

questions.question: How can I contribute to Flokicoin as a developer?
questions.answer: As a developer, you can contribute to Flokicoin by accessing the open-source code on our Git repositories. You can submit improvements, review code, and share ideas through FIPs (Flokicoin Improvement Proposals) or community discussions.

cards.title: How to setup your Flokicoin wallet

sections.title: 1. Data Collection
sections.subtitle: Information we collect
sections.description: We collect only the minimum necessary information to operate our platform efficiently. This may include your IP address, browser type, and usage behavior on the site.

sections.title: 2. Use of Information
sections.description: The data collected is used strictly to improve the user experience, analyze performance, and maintain security.

sections.title: 3. Data Sharing
sections.subtitle: With third parties
sections.description: We do not sell or share your data with any third party except when required by law or to protect our services.

sections.title: 4. Cookies
sections.subtitle: How we use cookies
sections.description: Our website uses cookies to personalize content and analyze traffic. You may choose to disable cookies in your browser settings.

sections.title: 5. Contact Us
sections.description: If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us at privacy@flokicoin.org.
